update tb_lgm_delivery_point
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=CHAR},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dlyp_name = #{dlypName,jdbcType=CHAR},
dlyp_passwd = #{dlypPasswd,jdbcType=CHAR},
dlyp_truename = #{dlypTruename,jdbcType=CHAR},
dlyp_mobile = #{dlypMobile,jdbcType=CHAR},

dlyp_idcard = #{dlypIdcard,jdbcType=CHAR},
dlyp_idcard_image = #{dlypIdcardImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dlyp_addtime = #{dlypAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dlyp_state = #{dlypState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dlyp_fail_reason = #{dlypFailReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where dlyp_id = #{dlypId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
